Module klimek.c482_inventorymanagementsystem
Package klimek.c482_inventorymanagementsystem

Class InventoryController

java.lang.Object
klimek.c482_inventorymanagementsystem.InventoryController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class InventoryController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for InventoryManagementSystem(main). Initializes the Part and Product TableViews with All added Part and Product Objects.

      selectedProduct

    • invalidStockAlert

      public static void invalidStockAlert()
      Static method implementing the Invalid Inventory message ERROR. Inventory must be between minimum inventory and maximum inventory.

    • invalidNameAlert

      public static void invalidNameAlert()
      Static method implementing the Invalid Name message ERROR. Name cannot be blank.

    • invalidNumberAlert

      public static void invalidNumberAlert()
      Static method implementing the Invalid Number message ERROR. Input must be a number.

    • invalidPriceAlert

      public static void invalidPriceAlert()
      Static method implementing the Invalid Price message ERROR. Price must be a positive number.

    • invalidSelectionAlert

      public static void invalidSelectionAlert()
      Static method implementing the Invalid Selection message ERROR. Alerts when user has not selected anything when required for a method call.

    • productHasAssocPartsAlert

      public static void productHasAssocPartsAlert()
      Static method implementing the Has associated Parts message ERROR. Alerts when a user attempts to delete a Product that has associated parts.

    • confirmDeleteAlert

      public static void confirmDeleteAlert()
      Static method to pop up a confirmation window when attempting to delete. Asks the user to confirm delete.

    • confirmSaveAlert

      public static void confirmSaveAlert()
      Static method to pop up a confirmation window when attempting to Save. Asks the user to confirm save.

    • confirmCancelAlert

      public static void confirmCancelAlert()
      Static method to pop up a confirmation window when attempting to Cancel a process. Asks the user to confirm cancel.

    • confirmExitAlert

      public static void confirmExitAlert()
      Static method to pop up a confirmation window when attempting to close the program. Asks the user to confirm closing the program.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the Inventory Controller. Sets Tableview column names and populates the Part and Product Tableviews.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
